# Netflix-Hidden-Gem-Score-Prediction
[Netflix jpg](https://www.google.com/imgres?q=netflix&imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fi.pcmag.com%2Fimagery%2Freviews%2F05cItXL96l4LE9n02WfDR0h-5.fit_scale.size_760x427.v1582751026.png&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pcmag.com%2Freviews%2Fnetflix&docid=UJ7BHHPqAOXjjM&tbnid=b0TtOaPouXaZ4M&vet=12ahUKEwjUvIaU5-eHAxWuqJUCHUt3BooQM3oECGMQAA..i&w=759&h=427&hcb=2&ved=2ahUKEwjUvIaU5-eHAxWuqJUCHUt3BooQM3oECGMQAA)
The Hidden Gem Score
The objective of this project was to create a model to predict the Hidden Gem Score of movies on Netflix

## Setup
The following librairies should be installed
>pip install numpy pandas scikit-learn matplotlib seaborn
>pip install jupyter
